name: Ghost Riot Axle Assembly Kit #KE0177
description: This is a parts kit for the axle assembly on your Ghost Riot.Kit includes: 4 x axle Ø15mm x 21mm,1 x axle Ø19mm Ø 24.6mm, 1 x axle Ø19mm x 31mm, 1 x axle Ø19mm x 53mm, 1 x axle Ø19mm x 71.5mm, 4 x nut Ø15mm x 3.3mm, 4 x nut Ø19mm x 4.0mm, 4 x screw M6 x 18mm x 14mm - T30, 4 x screw M5 x 14mm x 10mm - T25
